remarks: Definition of the category Rng, relativized to a subset ` u ` .  This is the category of all non-unital rings in ` u ` and homomorphisms between these rings.  Generally, we will take ` u ` to be a weak universe or Grothendieck universe, because these sets have closure properties as good as the real thing.  (New usage is discouraged.)  (Contributed by AV, 27-Feb-2020.)
